definition.name: Table
definition.purpose: Provides a styled, responsive table container for displaying tabular data.
definition.description: A reusable React component that wraps a native <table> element in a scrollable container, applying consistent styling and layout for use in application UIs.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <table> element.

initial.data: Empty table container with no rows or columns.

visible: A scrollable container with a table element.

when.description: Table receives children rows and columns.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the table.

visible: Table container with rows and columns.

definition.visualLayout: A div with horizontal overflow containing a styled <table> element.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <table> props.

definition.name: TableHeader
definition.purpose: Renders the table header section with consistent styling.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <thead> section of a table, applying border and layout styles.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <thead> element.

when.description: Header rows are provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the thead.

effects: Table header displays the provided rows.

definition.visualLayout: A <thead> element styled with a bottom border.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <thead> props.

definition.name: TableBody
definition.purpose: Renders the table body section for displaying rows of data.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <tbody> section of a table, applying consistent styling for the last row.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <tbody> element.

when.description: Body rows are provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the tbody.

effects: Table body displays the provided rows.

definition.visualLayout: A <tbody> element styled so the last row has no border.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <tbody> props.

definition.name: TableFooter
definition.purpose: Renders the table footer section for summary or totals.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <tfoot> section of a table, styled for summary rows or totals.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <tfoot> element.

visible: A <tfoot> element with background and border styling.

when.description: Footer rows are provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the tfoot.

effects: Table footer displays the provided rows.

definition.visualLayout: A <tfoot> element styled with a top border and muted background.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <tfoot> props.

definition.name: TableRow
definition.purpose: Renders a table row with interactive and stateful styling.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <tr> element, styled for hover and selected states.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <tr> element.

visible: A <tr> element with border and hover styling.

when.description: Row cells are provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the tr.

effects: Table row displays the provided cells.

definition.visualLayout: A <tr> element styled for border, hover, and selected states.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <tr> props.

definition.name: TableHead
definition.purpose: Renders a table header cell with consistent styling.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <th> element, styled for alignment, font, and checkbox support.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <th> element.

visible: A <th> element with font and alignment styling.

when.description: Header cell content is provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the th.

effects: Table header cell displays the provided content.

definition.visualLayout: A <th> element styled for font, alignment, and checkbox support.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <th> props.

definition.name: TableCell
definition.purpose: Renders a table data cell with consistent styling.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <td> element, styled for alignment and checkbox support.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <td> element.

when.description: Cell content is provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the td.

effects: Table data cell displays the provided content.

definition.visualLayout: A <td> element styled for alignment and checkbox support.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <td> props.

definition.name: TableCaption
definition.purpose: Renders a table caption for describing the table's content.
definition.description: A reusable React component for the <caption> element, styled for muted text and spacing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the <caption> element.

visible: A <caption> element with muted text styling.

when.description: Caption content is provided as children.
when.event: Children are rendered inside the caption.

effects: Table caption displays the provided content.

definition.visualLayout: A <caption> element styled for muted text and margin.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the cn utility for className merging. Accepts all native <caption> props.
